ai-patthana7.22:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in MN 4.)
ai-patthana7.22:1.1_0: if he doesn’t give rise to confidence in those without it.
ai-patthana7.22:1.1_1: if he doesn’t give rise to confidence in those without it.
ai-patthana7.22:1.1_2: if he doesn’t give rise to confidence in those without it.
ai-patthana7.22:1.1_3: There’s no cause or condition for the teachings.
ai-patthana7.22:1.1_4: There is no cause or condition for the teachings.
ai-patthana7.22:1.1_5: if he doesn’t give rise to the teachings of desire, the honor, and the respect of reverence for the teachings.
ai-patthana7.22:2.1_0: if he doesn’t give rise to confidence in those without it.
ai-patthana7.22:2.1_1: if he doesn’t give rise to confidence in those without it.
ai-patthana7.22:2.1_2: if he doesn’t give rise to confidence in those without it.
ai-patthana7.22:2.1_3: There are no cause or condition for the desire for views that arise.
ai-patthana7.22:2.1_4: One who doesn’t desire to approve of views, desire, fondness, thirst, passion, and craving for the teachings.
ai-patthana7.22:2.1_5: One who doesn’t approve of the teachings, the desire to stop, the removal of thirst, and the passion for the teachings.
ai-patthana7.22:3.1_0: if he doesn’t give rise to confidence in those without it.
ai-patthana7.22:3.1_1: if he doesn’t give rise to confidence in those without it.
ai-patthana7.22:3.1_2: if he does not give rise to confidence in those without it.
ai-patthana7.22:4.1_0: if he doesn’t give rise to confidence in those without it, and he doesn’t approve of the teachings.
ai-patthana7.22:5.1_0: if he doesn’t give rise to confidence in those without it, and he doesn’t approve of the teachings.
ai-patthana7.22:7.1_0: (This should be expanded as in the same way.)
